yahapalana aanduwata 2015 janawari 08 wanida pawathi janapathiwaranaye di labunu janawarama palath palana mathiwaranayedi thawath shakthimath wi athi bawin agamathiwaraya wenas kirime ho aanduwa illa aswime kisidu awashyathawak mathu wi nomathi bawa da rajitha senarathna mahatha sandahan karayi.
mema kridanganaya sambandhayen pradeshaye janathawa dakwanne yahapath prathicharayak nowe.
yatath wijithawadin paradawannatath ohu wayam kala.
meya nipadawuye bresht janma sanwathsaraya wenuweni.
sindiyen para pennana eka witharak neweyi eka loku sewayak nawaka blog karuwanta.
sunami ho gan wathura.
pasal jiwithe marama lassanayi.
mama hithana widiyata chayarupa shilpiyek wunama niyamitha widiyata ee dewal hadaralama madi.
kamara dorata hemihita thattu karana janthuwage angillak peneyi.
mulinma athula bildin eeka hoya ganna eeta passe oona kenak gen ahanna
sabawin pawathina sathuta wenuwen mata mawa his kirimata awasiya.
mema puwatha pala kirimehi ninditha aramuna wuye purawasiya yalith eekadhipathi palakayaku illa sitina bawath eeta wadathma sudussa kolambaa lassana kala gota bawath kiyannataya.
eseth nathinam eewa his pasuthalayak sahitha danwim puwaru ho durastha wikashana prekshakayanta adala nowana elimahan danwim puwaru prayojanayata ganimin prathishtapanaya kara thibe.
eeniya wishwasabhangayen pasu kala yuthu de janadhipathi pasugiya nawawanida parlimenthuwa wisuruwa harimen pasu wiwidha parshwa doloswani sanduda...
meka magaharunanam harima aparadayak.
rayak kiyannema kandulu gangak bawa dana rayata sapa kala kalayayi.
mama ekala piyasara niladhariyek.
ni soltan wuwayana.
wetarwaraya udesa mama ithirikala santhosamen mage diwa aahara wela pahasuwen pirimasaganimata thibini.
ehidi pradhana awadhanayak yomuwa thibune wiwaha wiya yuthu awama wayasa ihala nanwima sambandhawayi.
